name: Full Body Strength
description: A well-rounded strength training routine that targets all major muscle groups.

exercises.name: Push-ups
exercises.description: A bodyweight exercise that strengthens the chest, shoulders, and triceps.

exercises.name: Barbell Squat
exercises.description: A compound lower body exercise that engages the quadriceps, hamstrings, and glutes.

exercises.name: Deadlifts
exercises.description: An exercise that targets the posterior chain, including hamstrings, glutes, and lower back.

exercises.name: Pull-ups
exercises.description: A bodyweight exercise that builds back and biceps strength.

name: Upper Body Hypertrophy
description: A workout designed for upper body muscle growth and endurance.

exercises.name: Dumbbell Shoulder Press
exercises.description: An overhead press that targets the deltoid muscles.

exercises.name: Incline Bench Press
exercises.description: A variation of the bench press focusing on the upper chest.

exercises.name: Bicep Curls
exercises.description: An isolated exercise for strengthening the biceps.

exercises.name: Tricep Dips
exercises.description: A bodyweight movement that strengthens the triceps.

name: Lower Body Power
description: A workout designed to build lower body strength and power.

exercises.name: Bulgarian Split Squat
exercises.description: A single-leg squat variation that increases balance and lower body strength.

exercises.name: Romanian Deadlifts
exercises.description: A deadlift variation targeting hamstrings and glutes.

exercises.name: Calf Raises
exercises.description: A simple exercise for strengthening the calf muscles.

name: Fat Burning HIIT
description: A high-intensity interval training (HIIT) session for fat loss and endurance.

exercises.name: Jump Squats
exercises.description: An explosive movement that enhances lower body power and endurance.

exercises.name: Mountain Climbers
exercises.description: A full-body workout that improves endurance and core strength.

exercises.name: Burpees
exercises.description: A combination of strength and cardio that burns fat fast.

name: Mobility & Recovery
description: A routine focused on flexibility, mobility, and active recovery.

exercises.name: Cat-Cow Stretch
exercises.description: A yoga movement that improves spinal mobility.

exercises.name: Downward Dog
exercises.description: A yoga pose that stretches the hamstrings, calves, and shoulders.

exercises.name: Hip Flexor Stretch
exercises.description: A stretch that improves hip mobility and reduces stiffness.

name: Core Strength Builder
description: A workout focused on strengthening the core muscles for stability and performance.

exercises.name: Plank
exercises.description: A static hold that engages the entire core.

exercises.name: Russian Twists
exercises.description: An oblique-targeting movement performed with or without weights.

exercises.name: Leg Raises
exercises.description: A lower abdominal exercise that helps build strong hip flexors.

exercises.name: Bicycle Crunches
exercises.description: An advanced crunch variation that targets all areas of the core.

name: Endurance Challenge
description: A cardiovascular workout designed to improve stamina and endurance.

exercises.name: Jump Rope
exercises.description: A full-body exercise that enhances coordination and endurance.

exercises.name: Rowing Machine
exercises.description: A low-impact cardio workout that engages both upper and lower body.

exercises.name: Sprint Intervals
exercises.description: Short bursts of high-speed running to improve cardiovascular efficiency.
exercises.sets: 6 sets of 30 seconds sprint, 60 seconds walk

name: Bodyweight Warrior
description: A workout using only bodyweight exercises to build strength and control.

exercises.name: Pistol Squats
exercises.description: A single-leg squat variation that builds lower body strength and balance.

exercises.name: Handstand Push-ups
exercises.description: An advanced calisthenics move that strengthens shoulders and triceps.

exercises.name: L-Sit Hold
exercises.description: A core-intensive isometric hold requiring strength and balance.

exercises.name: Archer Push-ups
exercises.description: A unilateral push-up variation for chest and arm strength.

name: Functional Fitness
description: A workout focused on improving movement efficiency and injury prevention.

exercises.name: Farmers Carry
exercises.description: A grip and core strength-building exercise using weights.

exercises.name: Medicine Ball Slams
exercises.description: A full-body explosive movement to improve power.

exercises.name: Kettlebell Swings
exercises.description: A hip-driven exercise that builds posterior chain strength.

exercises.name: Battle Ropes
exercises.description: A high-intensity conditioning exercise that engages the whole body.

name: Kettlebell Strength
description: A workout utilizing kettlebells for strength and endurance.

exercises.name: Turkish Get-up
exercises.description: A full-body movement that improves stability and coordination.

exercises.name: Goblet Squats
exercises.description: A squat variation using a kettlebell to enhance lower body strength.

exercises.name: Kettlebell Snatch
exercises.description: An explosive movement targeting power and coordination.

exercises.name: Single Arm Kettlebell Press
exercises.description: A unilateral press for shoulder stability and strength.
